LANDING_PAGE.P_STEP1: 새로운 캠페인을 열고, 브랜드 홍보에 참여할 인스타그래머를 모집해 보세요.
LANDING_PAGE.P_STEP2: 브랜드 프로모션을 위해 가장 적합한 인스타그래머를 찾아보세요.
LANDING_PAGE.P_STEP3: 인스타그래머와 직접 연락하며 보다 간편하게 콜라보레이션 의뢰나 스케줄 조정이 가능하게 됩니다.
LANDING_PAGE.P_CASE1_1: ELLE cafe의 머그컵 신발매를 앞두고 소비자 인지 확대를 목적으로 8명의 인스타그래머와 브랜드가 홍보 캠페인을 실시. ELLE 브랜드 이미지와 테이블 풍경의 조화를 통해 보다 일상적이고 보다 친숙한 캠페인에 성공.
LANDING_PAGE.P_CASE1_2: 총 도달 수 　 좋아요' 합계　 코멘트 합계
LANDING_PAGE.P_CASE2_1: '빵,에스프레소 앤'의 한국 진출에 맞춰 6명의 인스타그래머와 함께 작업을 시작. 가게의 간판 메뉴인 프렌치 토스트를 중심으로 한 프로모션을 실시함으로써 신규 점포 개설에 앞서 '빵, 에스프레소 앤'' 한국 점포의 인지 확대와 손님을 모으는데 성공.
LANDING_PAGE.P_CASE2_2: 총 도달 수 　 좋아요' 합계　 코멘트 합계

PROFILE_PAGE_TERMS.P_2_4: expaus cannot be held liable for the content of the agreement regardless of the Promoter’s and the Instagramer’s use of the sample provided by expaus.
PROFILE_PAGE_TERMS.P_2_5: Under all circumstances, expaus cannot be held liable for any acts and/or omissions of neither the Instagramer nor the Promoter for any reason, including but not limited to infringements of third party rights including intellectual property rights or claims arisen as a result of either party’s failure to comply with obligations in the parties’ contractual relationship.
PROFILE_PAGE_TERMS.P_3: expaus will at all times act in accordance with the Japanese Act on Processing of Personal Data (Persondataloven), and personal data of the Instagramer will only be disclosed to a Promoter with the consent of the Instagramer.
PROFILE_PAGE_TERMS.P_4_1: expaus will at all times act in accordance with the Japanese Act on Processing of Personal Data (Persondataloven), and personal data of the Instagramer will only be disclosed to a Promoter with the consent of the Instagramer.
PROFILE_PAGE_TERMS.P_4_2: The Promoter or the Instagramer are at any time entitled to get the registration in the database of expaus deleted.
PROFILE_PAGE_TERMS.P_5_1: Unless otherwise expressly agreed in writing, no information provided to expaus shall be regarded as confidential, unless their confidential nature is obvious.

PROFILE_PAGE_TERMS.P_7_1: Except where prohibited by applicable law, expaus reserves the right to change these Terms of Use at any time without notice. AD_MESSAGE_PAGE.TIPS_3: You are reviewing the work submitted from Instagramer. You can either press 'Request Changes' or 'End Contract' button for the next step.
AD_MESSAGE_PAGE.TIPS_4: Instagramer is reworking on the work per your request.'Request Changes' button was pressed.
AD_MESSAGE_PAGE.TIPS_5: Instagramer has successfully completed the task. Release button was pressed and payment was released.
